(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Begin 
          (Statement 
            (MethodCall 
              (ArgumentList) 
              (Variable 
                (Identifier "foo")))) 
          (Else 
            (Statement 
              (MethodCall 
                (ArgumentList) 
                (Variable 
                  (Identifier "bar"))))))))))
